text: Asɨ 5.14 Wkp 19.18, Mt 5.43, 7.12, Lom 13.8-9, Je 2.8 dɨ manasɨŋ hekɨlɨ agaŋ nameŋ abami uami. Nalusaŋ nukeŋ saŋ mavɨn hekɨlɨ hɨnilalaŋ hameŋ ala naludɨ isagalinalu imahalinalu agɨlasaŋ avi mavɨn hekɨlɨ hɨnihalaŋ aba abami uami. Ciaŋ hameŋ agaŋ ciaŋ vɨdɨvɨdɨŋ Mosesɨ lɨbami limu hɨhɨle agɨladɨ sɨkasɨkan lalɨguavɨla hɨnilalɨ uami.
